item.title: By: Judith
item.dc:creator: Judith
item.description: <p>well we're still alive! no well done it was a good meal and nice for mum to relax, today our house stuff is all official so once we've moved it'll be our turn to cook for people! </p>
item.content:encoded: well we’re still alive! no well done it was a good meal and nice for mum to relax, today our house stuff is all official so once we’ve moved it’ll be our turn to cook for people!

item.title: By: Simon
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description: <p>Well Have chef! Have got broadband going - it is very fast indeed!</p>
item.content:encoded: Well Have chef! Have got broadband going – it is very fast indeed!

item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p>It was so nice to have lunch cooked for me for a change - and a very nice lunch it was too!! What a lovely treat for Mother's Day and I was spoiled with cards/gifts from the other kids too!!<br/><br/>Sincere thanks.</p>
item.content:encoded:
It was so nice to have lunch cooked for me for a change – and a very nice lunch it was too!! What a lovely treat for Mother’s Day and I was spoiled with cards/gifts from the other kids too!!

Sincere thanks.
